title: Most popular cheese brands in the United Kingdom ( UK ) 2013
summary: This statistic displays the Most popular United Kingdom and UK siding United by Kingdom construction firms in 2013 .
The survey revealed that 51 % of the respondents popular Cathedral_City Cheese the Most .
gold: This statistic displays the leading cheese brands in the United Kingdom ( UK ) , according to a survey conducted in November 2013.
Cathedral city and supermarket own label cheeses ranked highest , with the greatest percentage of respondents purchasing their cheese products at the time of survey.
Retail sales volumes of cheese have increased year on year , with cheddar cheese the most popular type of hard cheese in the United Kingdom , mature cheddar in particular .
